summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General documenting a voluntary interview conducted on September 1, 2021, with a Federal Bureau of Prisons Lieutenant regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in August 2019. The document lists numerous attachments including interview transcripts, logs, emails, and reports from the time of Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased inmate at Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, subject of the OIG investigation into his death while in custody.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.role: Operations Lieutenant, Federal Bureau of Prisons
persons.context: BOP Lieutenant at MCC New York who was interviewed by OIG agents regarding Epstein's death and the circumstances surrounding it.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant as part of the OIG investigation into Epstein's death.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant alongside the Special Agent.

persons.name: Captain
persons.context: Mentioned as recipient of an email dated August 12, 2019, in the list of attachments to the investigation.

connections.description: The Lieutenant was an Operations Lieutenant at MCC New York when Epstein was housed there, placing him in a supervisory/custodial role over the inmate.
The OIG Special Agent conducted a voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant as part of the investigation into Epstein's death.
The OIG Senior Special Agent conducted a voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant alongside the Special Agent.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Special Agent and Senior Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary recorded interview of a BOP Lieutenant regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, triggering an OIG investigation.

events.title: Epstein's Incarceration at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York in July and August 2019 prior to his death.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted an investigation (Case Number: 2019-010614) into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
A BOP Operations Lieutenant was interviewed on September 1, 2021, regarding Epstein's death while in custody at MCC New York in August 2019.

The investigation gathered extensive documentation including interview transcripts, lieutenant logs, activity reports, assignment rosters, emails, and count documents from the period surrounding Epstein's death.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum that contains neither recommendations nor conclusions and is restricted from distribution outside the receiving agency.
